title: Blogging-Based Project Learning for Enhancing Design Thinking Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational design processes and creative problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Learners explore applying design thinking to solve social issues, utilizing personal devices for online collaboration and reflective blogging

learning_goals: Learners can derive project outcomes by applying the 5-stage design thinking process to real-world social issues.
Learners systematically document and reflect on learning content for each stage of the design thinking process through weekly blogging.
Learners can evaluate the feasibility and user-centeredness of design solutions through feedback-based improvement activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
